channel.title: OpenCV on Pijuan Yu
channel.description: Recent content in OpenCV on Pijuan Yu

item.title: Collaborative Manipulation - In Progress
item.description: The purpose of this project is to do the navigation, SLAM, and track an apriltag for an omnidirectional robot by using one T265 tracking camera (above). This camera will be undistorted to get a disparity map, 3D point clouds, and laser scan. Then I will use this camera to get a 2D map and use ROS Navigation stack package to do the navigation. Finally, I will do the formation control to control a group of three omnidirectional robots.
